title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Transport of
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Transport of 

Dangerous Goods by Rail) (Amendment) Regulations 2025. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 30 June 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited european union (transport dangerous good rail) (amendment) regulation 2025 (2) regulation shall come operation 30 june 2025

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of
heading: 2. Regulation 2(1) of the European Communities (Transport of Dangerous
text_raw:
2. Regulation 2(1) of the European Communities (Transport of Dangerous 

Goods by Rail) Regulations 2010 (S.I. No. 651 of 2010) is amended – 

(a) 

by the substitution of the following definition for the definition of 
“Directive”: 

“ ‘Directive’ means Directive 2008/68/EC of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 24 September 20081 on the 
inland transport of dangerous goods as last amended by 
Commission Delegated Directive (EU) 2025/149 of 15 November 
20242;”, 

and 

(b) by the substitution of the following definition for the definition of 

“RID”: 

“ ‘RID’ means the ‘Regulations concerning the International 
Carriage of Dangerous Goods by Rail (RID)’, appearing as 
Appendix C to the ‘Convention concerning International Carriage 
by Rail (COTIF)’ concluded at Vilnius on 3 June 1999, as 
applicable with effect from 1 January 2009 and the Annex to 
those Regulations, as referred to in section II.1 in Annex II to the 
Directive, as applicable with effect from 1 January 2025;”. 

1 OJ No. L 260, 30.09.2008, p.13 
2 OJ L, 2025/149, 24.1.2025 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 27th June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [275] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

26 June, 2025. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 
Minister for Transport. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [275]

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of these Regulations is to amend the European Communities 
(Transport of Dangerous Goods by Rail) Regulations 2010 (S.I. No. 651 of 2010) 
in line with the amending Commission Delegated Directive (EU) 2025/149 of 
15 November 2024 (insofar as that Directive relates to inland transport of 
dangerous goods by rail). 

The Annexes to Directive 2008/68/EC (the main EU Directive on the inland 
transport of dangerous goods) have been further adapted to scientific and 
technical progress by Commission Delegated Directive (EU) 2025/149 and the 
definitions for “Directive” and “RID” in S.I. No. 651 of 2010 have been 
amended to reflect these changes. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [275] 5
